title: Subject Pronouns
description: I, you, he, she, it, we, they – use them correctly in context.

subtopics.title: Pronouns and Verb Agreement
subtopics.description: Match each pronoun with the correct verb form.

examples.marker: I / you / we / they + base verb
examples.explanation: No -s ending in the present simple.

subtopics.title: Replacing Nouns
subtopics.description: Use pronouns to avoid repeating nouns.

examples.explanation: Substitute a person's name with a pronoun.
examples.sample: Maria is my friend. She lives nearby.
The books are new. They are on the table.

exercises.instruction: Replace the noun with a pronoun.
